title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project's scope, requirements, and constraints, including the desired features, performance criteria, security considerations, relevant regulations or policies, data privacy and ethical concerns, and potential risks or limitations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and communication between different modules, such as AI, camera network, and license plate recognition.

title: Develop AI Module
description: Develop the AI module responsible for processing camera footage and recognizing license plates, including training data preparation, model selection, and performance optimization.

title: Implement Camera Network Integration
description: Develop the components responsible for integrating with the existing camera network, handling data streams, and communicating with the AI module.

title: Design and Develop Database
description: Design and implement the database schema to store vehicle movement data, license plate information, and any other relevant data required by the system.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring and managing the system, including visualizing vehicle movements, querying license plate data, and configuring system settings.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect the system from unauthorized access, data breaches, and other potential threats, including access controls, encryption, and auditing mechanisms.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline to automate the build, testing, and deployment processes for the system.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the system's functionality, performance, and reliability, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.
